Hello every one. Names Dusty, I\'m from Canada (Eh?) Spend most of my time sitting on my computer playing games, or trying to program new ones.

I bought KSP a few days ago and I\'m loving it so far, can\'t wait to see what comes out in future patches.

I was looking around in options and noticed the I could use Flight Controls. I dug out my old Saitek X45 but I\'m having some issues, half the buttons don\'t work, pretty sure its the drivers not the controls them self\'s, so if any one else is using a pair send me a message, I\'m going to try to check the forms fairly regularly. Until then I\'ll stick with the keyboard.

I was also looking at making a mod I\'ve got some experience in C# as well as few other languages but i don\'t know where to start on making a mod. I can\'t seem to find the basics for the programming side of a mod anywhere.

Thanks for the help. and Hopefully I\'ll be around to help other people once I\'m more experienced and know what I\'m doing.

later everyone.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!
